tool_description:
API to get data from taobao and tmall marketplace.
Taobao and Tmall api from https://otcommerce.com/taobao/
title: Taobao Tmall

api_list.name: Search for items
api_list.description: Search fo Toabao or Tmall products by title, price, image, orders volume.

api_list.name: Get Item full info
api_list.description: Get full data from Toabao or Tmall product by Item Id

api_list.name: Get DeliveryAreaList
api_list.description: Get  Area codes for delivery request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-tmall1.p.rapidapi.com/GetProviderAllAreaList"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-tmall1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
